reviews.title: Grandmother's home truly welcome
reviews.text: On a journey to see Santander, the birthplace of our grandmother, my sister and I had a wonderful time at this excellent hotel. From the welcoming speedy check-in to the widest range of food at any buffet breakfast we have experienced, the hotel excelled. The decor is modern and stylish. The foyer doubles as lounge, bar and cafe with tables outside to enjoy the habourside views. The staff were wonderful, nothing was too much trouble and people appeared as if by magic when needed! Literally a step away from the old town with a bus stop outside to assist exploration of the wonderful countryside and beaches!

Very small hotel, across from the marina with an excellent view. Our family of 5 stayed and it was not confortable, there is NO AIRCONDITIONING. The front desk said it cools during the night, however; it was quite hot in MARCH. The luggage cart was a indutrial cart and there was no bellboy. On the other hand the hotel is very clean, beautifull decor (all blue and white, which I love). In the hallways it actually smell like sewer. Breakfast buffet was very nice
reviews.title: Great view...

likes.liked: — The view from the front window
likes.disliked: — NO air conditioning, no bellboy, sewer smell in hallways, no parking to unload the luggage.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was booked after looking at reviews on trip advisor. It certainly lived up to expectations. with its harbour front location The decor is ultramodern, the room was very clean and comfortable. Unfotunately our room view was to the rear and looked out onto a disused block of flats, it would have been worth booking a seaview..
reviews.title: great seafront location

likes.liked: — the location, within easy walking distance of main attractions
likes.disliked: — bar limited, meals available but served in reception area, breakfast expensive

reviews.title: Great location, nice surroundings and friendly staff
reviews.text: The bus stop is just outside the front door, one euro will get you to the town centre and 2 euros to the beach. We did not eat in the hotel as the tapas on display always looked vwery tired.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a wonderful chocolate shop just next door which serves continental breakfasts as well as hot chocolate drinks and any variety of exotic handmade chocolates, and many restaurants and bars within easy walking distance.
reviews.title: Great location - modern hotel

reviews.text: We arrived early on a Monday morning and where greeted with smiles by the receptionist. She duly booked us in and allowed us to deposit our luggage in a locked room.
reviews.title: Well worth a visit

reviews.text: The hotel is very clean and very modern!! We where given a rear room and didn't experiance any other the other visitors problems.
reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
Superb!
reviews.text: The mini bar was well stocked if required!! and the bathroom had a hairdryer and a large supply of toiletries which was replenished daily.
The only thing we missed was a kettle!!!
reviews.title: Excellent stay ...

reviews.text: We would certainly visit again.
reviews.title: Very disappointing
Excellent Location
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel in May 2007 and were impressed immediately by the level of service offered. We arrived at around 10pm and were greeted by a friendly receptionist who then gave us a map and recommendations of bars and restaurants in the area.
Everyting was within walking distance from the hotel and we were provided with a sea view room which was definaltey worth it!!
reviews.title: wouldn't stay here again

reviews.text: The facilities in the hotel were excellent - the rooms are modern and very business like though perfect for a short stay!
reviews.title: For the price - Excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is an extremely clean hotel and very well presented.
reviews.title: Very welcoming...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would definaltey stay in this hotel again and for the price we paid it was a bargain!!
reviews.title: Disappointing Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The place we selected in Santander might be seen as just your typical business hotel and I guess it was. But it sure was nice and the breakfast might have been the best on our trip to Northern Spain.
reviews.title: Vincci Puerto Chico, a swell hotel

likes.liked: — Location, servicability, cleanliness, ease of access

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We wanted to stay near the water, so I selected this hotel for its location directly on the yacht harbor Puerto Chico, rather than a place in the commercial heart of the city or even on the beach at El Sardinero. Glad we did. We thought the location perfect, with views across the street to the harbor and close enough to the commercial heart that we could walk it easily. We’d not have liked staying in El Sardinero where we’d have needed to drive back to town in order to see the majority of sights.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The harbor was more clean kept than I’d envisioned—no cute, colorful fishing boats with nets draped over them and cats sleeping beneath them as I’d have preferred—but a nice picture out the window.
reviews.title: Brilliant Hotel

likes.liked: — Modern facilities close to town centre

reviews.text: Our room, one of 52 in the hotel, was business-like serviceable but had a chair with reading lamp right by the window and a nice bathroom with good shower and tub. The entrance to the hotel had a small bar and tables spread with newspapers and there was a small sidewalk café outside.
reviews.title: Clean and spacious

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were able to find parking (for which there was an additional charge) in the municipal garage beneath the hotel and to exit the garage by foot just steps from the entry to the hotel. Nice in a larger city.
reviews.title: Lovely break at Vincci Puerto Chico
